title: Ticket #7574: create use feature OAUTH metaknob for easy configuration
description:
Create a metaknob that automatically enables as much of the OAuth support as possible.

The metaknob will be: 

use feature : OAUTH

This metaknob will need to essentially set the following, preferably only on submit nodes and do nothing on other nodes. Some of these can maybe go in the param table. (This section subject to update...) 

DAEMON_LIST = $(DAEMON_LIST), CREDD, CREDMON_OAUTH
TRUST_CREDENTIAL_DIRECTORY = True
CREDMON_OAUTH = /usr/bin/condor_credmon_oauth
CREDMON_OAUTH_LOG = $(LOG)/CredMonOAuthLog
Note that there is a special knob called AUTO_INCLUDE_CREDD_IN_DAEMON_LIST that will probably tie into this, since we need only one of those whether it's OAuth, KRBAFS, or both enabled.
